TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Sandimen, title = Sandimen, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sandimen} }

S.FORM: Sandimen Sandimen a sakuwan ku Pingtung. kumud nu kalesakan, 185.9 km². (kalesakan nu linpanti 94.02 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 85.25 km²), u kasabinawlan, 7,698 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 2,296 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 7,320 ku ingcumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 95%(Paiwan, Rukai) ku kasabinawlan. u Paiwan atu Rukai ku sakalaniyazu'. nikasakuwakuwan Sandimen mala 10 a cuwen atu 12 ku niyazu'. kina 12 a niyazu'sa, Timur , Tjavatjavang , Valjulu , Paridrayan , Sagaran , Talamakau , Cavak , Djineljepan , Tjailjaking , Kingdalruwane , Tjukuvulj , Tjusepayuan . Sandimen (Paiwan a binacadan a kamu, Timur)i tini i Taywan nuwamisan nu Ping-tung-siang, nuwamisan nu Kaw-sing-se Maw-lin-cuy, Liw-kuay-cuy, nuwalian macapi i Wu-tay-siang, satip macapi u Kaw-su-siang, Yan-pu-siang, nutimulan macapi i Ne-pu-siang, Ma-ciy-siang. u ahebal ku lala' makala tu 196 ping-bang-kung-li, nipasilut tu ngangan i Ping-tung-siang u sakatulu nu tabakiay, uyni dada'Se-ce-siang, U'-tay-siang, u tademaw pakala' tu 7.7 malebut a tademaw, u kakatuuday nu Ping-tung-siang a tademaw nu binacadan a niyazu'. Sandimen (排灣語:Timur) . Sandimen (Paiwan a binacadan a kamu, Timur)i tini i Taywan nuwamisan nu Ping-tung-siang, nuwamisan nu Kaw-sing-se Maw-lin-cuy, Liw-kuay-cuy, nuwalian macapi i Wu-tay-siang, satip macapi u Kaw-su-siang, Yan-pu-siang, nutimulan macapi i Ne-pu-siang, Ma-ciy-siang. u ahebal ku lala' makala tu 196 ping-bang-kung-li, nipasilut tu ngangan i Ping-tung-siang u sakatulu nu tabakiay, uyni dada'Se-ce-siang, U'-tay-siang, u tademaw pakala' tu 7.7 malebut a tademaw, u kakatuuday nu Ping-tung-siang a tademaw nu binacadan a niyazu'. Sandimen mala 10 a cuwen atu 12 ku niyazu'. kina 12 a niyazu'sa, Timur , Tjavatjavang , Valjulu , Paridrayan , Sagaran , Talamakau , Cavak , Djineljepan , Tjailjaking , Kingdalruwane , Tjukuvulj , Tjusepayuan . uynian a buyu'a lala' atu enal u kalalikeluhan a kakitizaan, kayadahay ku masaungcuyungcuyay a buyu',hay-pa i 100 katukuh i 2,159 depah, izaw ku Ay-liaw a sauwactalabi i niyazu', 流經鄉境demiad tungusay u ze-day-ci-bung a demiad, aenengan a binawlan u Paiwan a binacadan u kahenulan,u zumaay a Paiwan a binacadan, mahiza u Sin-ye a niyazu', ayzaay a mihcaan pakala tu sakapahay aidangan a kakitizaan, patayza i Maw-lin a kanatalay a idangan. Laylay Sandimen ,源自排灣語"timur", (Suann-tē-mn̂g).1935年,日本將排灣族Timur,Talavatsal,Salalau ". Sandimen , lalengawan/lalekalan namakayni i Paiwan a kamu,"timur" malinat tayni miatang ku layakay nu tayniay a Hulan nu lalayay tunisasengiay a ngiha' kyu palu nu buyu'ay a kiwmah a banuh tu San-ti-men, nu ayaza i Taywan layakay a kamu masakamu tu San-ti-men "Suann-tē-mn̂g" 1935 a mihca i kaLipunan u Paywan a binacadan tu Timur, Talavatsal, Salalau tuluay nu kenis a tademaw malimat hay nikatukuh ayza nu Sandimen a kenis, nisasulitaan sakaysasangaan tu kalcalaecay nuzazan a kasaupuaan nu niyazu'ay, nanutawya nu Takaw a kenis atu Pingtungay a kenis nipikuwan, panganga han sa "サンティモン". nazikuzan nu Kang-hu tu sayaway misumad tu Ta-kawan a kenis nu Sandimen a nikasu u ouwan malecabay a kenis, 1947 amihcaan masumat u Sandimen a kenis, 1950 a mihcaan masumat aca tu baluhayay nu Ping-tung a kenis, 1992 a mihcaan waluay a bulad hanika ayza kinangangan. mikawaway tu kawaw nu kanatal a kakitazaan kenis i tiniay a kenis izaw ku cacay nataan a niyazu'(本鄉共10村) Cing-ye a niyazu', An-po a niyazu' Cing-san a niyazu' Ma-l-el a niyazu' Cow-se a niyazu' Say-ciya a niyazu' San-ti-men niyazu' Ta-se a niyazu' De-wen a niyazu' Ta-lay a niyazu' Cing-ye a niyazu' An-pu a niyazu' Cing-san a niyazu' a niyazu' Ma-el a niyazu' Kou-se a niyazu' Say-ciya a niyazu' San-ti a niyazu' Ta-se a niyazu' Sandimen tini i nuwamisan Taywan Pin-tung a kuwan, u belaw saamisan nu 高雄 akuwan Maw-lin a kenis, Liw-kuay a kenis, nuwalian u belaw u Uw-tay a kenis, satipan a belaw u Kaw-su a kenis, Yen-pu a kenis, mitules tu Ne-pu a kenis, Ma-ciya a kenis. katinengan Sandimen kasumamadan a ngangan u "Sin-se-di-mo-el", tungusay u Lukay a binacadan "San-ti-men" kenis a niyazu', Cung-ku a ,Cung-kou a u nu layakay akakitizaan nu malimatay nu layak miatang u layakay akamu misasengiay tu pipangangan "San-cu-maw-se" atu "Sandimen ." Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw/Shanchuan Glass Suspension Bridge Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw tini i Taywan Maw-lin piazihan tu hekal nu kantal a kakitizaan, mitulesay tu Ping-tung akuwan San-ti-men a kenis atu Majia a kenis tu caculilang nu tademaw cuyacuy a sangaw, miawas tu Kaw-ping sauwac adidi'ay cilis Ay-liaw a sauwac, u uzip nu sangaw u masacuyacuyay a sangaw, katanayu' a sangaw 262 kung-ce, laed tu sauwac palalecad tu talakaw sepat bataan izaw ku lima debah, nau satanayaay masacuyacuay a sangaw, katukuh 2017 a mihcaan u Tuing atuse Fu-sing a kakitizaan u baluhay a sacumud nu sauwac cuyavuy a sangaw "katanayu' nu sangaw 303 debah malakuit tuway". Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw/Shanchuan Glass Suspension Bridge u satakus tu Ping-tung akuwan San-ti-men a kenis San-ti a niyazu' atu Majia a kenis Pa-ye a niyazu' tu cuyacuy a sangaw, tunusay masacuyacuyay a sangaw, u sakatuuday pitubian tu tademaw cacay lasubu, Liu-li-cu a sakahini tu pipazeng nu Paiwan a binacadan a Yi-su-ciya ci Sa-ku-liw-pa-wa-wa-lung mibihekacan a misanga', u uzip nu sangaw tusaay a takinilan izaw kunipazeng tu tulu bataan izaw ku tusa a paya' tu kungku, nusakamu 32 masazumaay a kungku nu niyazu', cuyacuy a sangaw i sacumut atu katukuhan patizeng tu Ma-say-ke yi-su-zuo-pin atu tabakiay a ba'tu kunipazeng tu yi-su. uzip tu sangaw tusa a takinilan pahezek tu pitanam katukuh tatengaay tu amiculul a demiadan micunus tu mipazeng tu 1,664 ku Liu-li-cu. malumanay a Fa-wan a niyazu' na u Paiwanay tu ,Rukai a binacadan u lalangawan a tuas ulalekalan a lala' nu tuas, malumanay a Fa-wan u talakaw pakala tu 800 debah, ba'tuay aluma' micangday tu butu' amipatizeng atu nu ayawan a buyu' tu Se-lu, Kaw-yan atu kapahay aucya niyazu' silaed tu ai-liau nutimulan a sauwac, ilabu ku kakitizaan nu Paiwan a binacadan a kakawsan a buyu' "Ta-uw a buyu'", kasilut nu Paiwan a binacadan ba'tuay a luma' masupet u masakapahay malisimed u mahiniay nusuayaway tu butu' micapiay tu nanum, u satalakaway a maazih ku kakitizaan a lala' pawapen tu kasumamadanay tu Fa-wan a tademaw lihalay kunikauzip, uyza sa amitena' tu miubiay tu kapahay a ucya, i saayaway a mihcaan u Fa-wan niyazu' a tademaw katukuh tu cacay lasubu kayadah ku luma', u pikuwanay nu Lipun a ziday Lipun a tademaw napacici tu Se-lu atu Kaw-yan tusaay niyazu'an a tademaw, mabulaw tayza i Fa-wan, Taywan napatizang hawsa ku-min-cen-bu pasilut aca tu tuluay niyazu' a tademaw mabulaw ku niyazu' tayza i ayzaay Pa-yia, Majia atu Fa-wan a niyazu', nauyaanan u Fa-wan a niyazu' pasumad han ku ngangan u malumanay Fa-wan.

Sandimen Sandimen a sakowan ko Pingtong. komod no kalesakan, 185.9 km². (kalesakan no linpanti 94.02 km², kalesakan no pawliwti 85.25 km²), o kasabinawlan, 7,698 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 2,296 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 7,320 ko ingcomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, Pakalato 95%(Paiwan, Rokai) ko kasabinawlan. o Paiwan ato Rokai ko sakalaniyazo'. nikasakowakowan Sandimen mala 10 a cowen ato 12 ko niyazo'. kina 12 a niyazo'sa, Timor , Tjavatjavang , Valjolo , Paridrayan , Sagaran , Talamakao , Cavak , Djineljepan , Tjailjaking , Kingdalrowane , Tjokovolj , Tjosepayoan . Sandimen (Paiwan a binacadan a kamo, Timor)i tini i Taywan nowamisan no Ping-tong-siang, nowamisan no Kaw-sing-se Maw-lin-coy, Liw-koay-coy, nowalian macapi i Wo-tay-siang, satip macapi o Kaw-so-siang, Yan-po-siang, notimolan macapi i Ne-po-siang, Ma-ciy-siang. o ahebal ko lala' makala to 196 ping-bang-kong-li, nipasilot to ngangan i Ping-tong-siang o sakatolo no tabakiay, oyni dada'Se-ce-siang, U'-tay-siang, o tademaw pakala' to 7.7 malebot a tademaw, o kakatooday no Ping-tong-siang a tademaw no binacadan a niyazo'. Sandimen (排灣語:Timor) . Sandimen (Paiwan a binacadan a kamo, Timor)i tini i Taywan nowamisan no Ping-tong-siang, nowamisan no Kaw-sing-se Maw-lin-coy, Liw-koay-coy, nowalian macapi i Wo-tay-siang, satip macapi o Kaw-so-siang, Yan-po-siang, notimolan macapi i Ne-po-siang, Ma-ciy-siang. o ahebal ko lala' makala to 196 ping-bang-kong-li, nipasilot to ngangan i Ping-tong-siang o sakatolo no tabakiay, oyni dada'Se-ce-siang, U'-tay-siang, o tademaw pakala' to 7.7 malebot a tademaw, o kakatooday no Ping-tong-siang a tademaw no binacadan a niyazo'. Sandimen mala 10 a cowen ato 12 ko niyazo'. kina 12 a niyazo'sa, Timor , Tjavatjavang , Valjolo , Paridrayan , Sagaran , Talamakao , Cavak , Djineljepan , Tjailjaking , Kingdalrowane , Tjokovolj , Tjosepayoan . oynian a boyo'a lala' ato enal o kalalikelohan a kakitizaan, kayadahay ko masaongcoyongcoyay a boyo',hay-pa i 100 katokoh i 2,159 depah, izaw ko Ay-liaw a saowactalabi i niyazo', 流經鄉境demiad tongosay o ze-day-ci-bong a demiad, aenengan a binawlan o Paiwan a binacadan o kahenolan,o zomaay a Paiwan a binacadan, mahiza o Sin-ye a niyazo', ayzaay a mihcaan pakala to sakapahay aidangan a kakitizaan, patayza i Maw-lin a kanatalay a idangan. Laylay Sandimen ,源自排灣語"timor", (Soann-tē-mn̂g).1935年,日本將排灣族Timor,Talavatsal,Salalao ". Sandimen , lalengawan/lalekalan namakayni i Paiwan a kamo,"timor" malinat tayni miatang ko layakay no tayniay a Holan no lalayay tonisasengiay a ngiha' kyo palo no boyo'ay a kiwmah a banoh to San-ti-men, no ayaza i Taywan layakay a kamo masakamo to San-ti-men "Soann-tē-mn̂g" 1935 a mihca i kaLiponan o Paywan a binacadan to Timor, Talavatsal, Salalao toloay no kenis a tademaw malimat hay nikatokoh ayza no Sandimen a kenis, nisasolitaan sakaysasangaan to kalcalaecay nozazan a kasaopoaan no niyazo'ay, nanotawya no Takaw a kenis ato Pingtongay a kenis nipikowan, panganga han sa "サンティモン". nazikozan no Kang-ho to sayaway misomad to Ta-kawan a kenis no Sandimen a nikaso o oowan malecabay a kenis, 1947 amihcaan masomat o Sandimen a kenis, 1950 a mihcaan masomat aca to balohayay no Ping-tong a kenis, 1992 a mihcaan waloay a bolad hanika ayza kinangangan. mikawaway to kawaw no kanatal a kakitazaan kenis i tiniay a kenis izaw ko cacay nataan a niyazo'(本鄉共10村) Cing-ye a niyazo', An-po a niyazo' Cing-san a niyazo' Ma-l-el a niyazo' Cow-se a niyazo' Say-ciya a niyazo' San-ti-men niyazo' Ta-se a niyazo' De-wen a niyazo' Ta-lay a niyazo' Cing-ye a niyazo' An-po a niyazo' Cing-san a niyazo' a niyazo' Ma-el a niyazo' Koo-se a niyazo' Say-ciya a niyazo' San-ti a niyazo' Ta-se a niyazo' Sandimen tini i nowamisan Taywan Pin-tong a kowan, o belaw saamisan no 高雄 akowan Maw-lin a kenis, Liw-koay a kenis, nowalian o belaw o Uw-tay a kenis, satipan a belaw o Kaw-so a kenis, Yen-po a kenis, mitoles to Ne-po a kenis, Ma-ciya a kenis. katinengan Sandimen kasomamadan a ngangan o "Sin-se-di-mo-el", tongosay o Lokay a binacadan "San-ti-men" kenis a niyazo', Cong-ko a ,Cong-koo a o no layakay akakitizaan no malimatay no layak miatang o layakay akamo misasengiay to pipangangan "San-co-maw-se" ato "Sandimen ." Shan-choan coyacoy a sangaw Shan-choan coyacoy a sangaw/Shanchoan Glass Sospension Bridge Shan-choan coyacoy a sangaw tini i Taywan Maw-lin piazihan to hekal no kantal a kakitizaan, mitolesay to Ping-tong akowan San-ti-men a kenis ato Majia a kenis to cacolilang no tademaw coyacoy a sangaw, miawas to Kaw-ping saowac adidi'ay cilis Ay-liaw a saowac, o ozip no sangaw o masacoyacoyay a sangaw, katanayo' a sangaw 262 kong-ce, laed to saowac palalecad to talakaw sepat bataan izaw ko lima debah, nao satanayaay masacoyacoay a sangaw, katokoh 2017 a mihcaan o Toing atose Fo-sing a kakitizaan o balohay a sacomod no saowac coyavoy a sangaw "katanayo' no sangaw 303 debah malakoit toway". Shan-choan coyacoy a sangaw/Shanchoan Glass Sospension Bridge o satakos to Ping-tong akowan San-ti-men a kenis San-ti a niyazo' ato Majia a kenis Pa-ye a niyazo' to coyacoy a sangaw, tonosay masacoyacoyay a sangaw, o sakatooday pitobian to tademaw cacay lasobo, Lio-li-co a sakahini to pipazeng no Paiwan a binacadan a Yi-so-ciya ci Sa-ko-liw-pa-wa-wa-long mibihekacan a misanga', o ozip no sangaw tosaay a takinilan izaw konipazeng to tolo bataan izaw ko tosa a paya' to kongko, nosakamo 32 masazomaay a kongko no niyazo', coyacoy a sangaw i sacomot ato katokohan patizeng to Ma-say-ke yi-so-zoo-pin ato tabakiay a ba'to konipazeng to yi-so. ozip to sangaw tosa a takinilan pahezek to pitanam katokoh tatengaay to amicolol a demiadan miconos to mipazeng to 1,664 ko Lio-li-co. malomanay a Fa-wan a niyazo' na o Paiwanay to ,Rokai a binacadan o lalangawan a toas olalekalan a lala' no toas, malomanay a Fa-wan o talakaw pakala to 800 debah, ba'toay aloma' micangday to boto' amipatizeng ato no ayawan a boyo' to Se-lo, Kaw-yan ato kapahay aocya niyazo' silaed to ai-liao notimolan a saowac, ilabo ko kakitizaan no Paiwan a binacadan a kakawsan a boyo' "Ta-ow a boyo'", kasilot no Paiwan a binacadan ba'toay a loma' masopet o masakapahay malisimed o mahiniay nosoayaway to boto' micapiay to nanom, o satalakaway a maazih ko kakitizaan a lala' pawapen to kasomamadanay to Fa-wan a tademaw lihalay konikaozip, oyza sa amitena' to miobiay to kapahay a ocya, i saayaway a mihcaan o Fa-wan niyazo' a tademaw katokoh to cacay lasobo kayadah ko loma', o pikowanay no Lipon a ziday Lipon a tademaw napacici to Se-lo ato Kaw-yan tosaay niyazo'an a tademaw, mabolaw tayza i Fa-wan, Taywan napatizang hawsa ko-min-cen-bo pasilot aca to toloay niyazo' a tademaw mabolaw ko niyazo' tayza i ayzaay Pa-yia, Majia ato Fa-wan a niyazo', naoyaanan o Fa-wan a niyazo' pasomad han ko ngangan o malomanay Fa-wan.
